item.description:
Whew, we have 101 members of this meetup, yet I seldom hear from many of you. Please let me know what can be done to serve you better...

We will resume our meetups in January. Until then, consider joining us on our Facebook page (search for A Place of Light) where we have weekly exercises and a very suportive community!

As always, please feel free to contact me about any questions you may have about linking with the spirit world!

Dance in the Light,

Susan
item.name: No Meetup until January
